author: Christopher Tran <pfftdammitchris@gmail.com>
description: NOODL is a language stemmed from the YAML language. This library gives you the tools to build JavaScript applications using Neural Object Oriented Descriptive Language
name: noodl

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src "src/**/*.ts" --file src/__tests__/setup.ts
scripts.test:file: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src --file src/__tests__/setup.ts
